resources.string: Required for IP rotation via airplane mode toggle
Setting MobileProxy as the Digital Assistant grants WRITE_SECURE_SETTINGS, which allows silent airplane mode toggling for IP rotation â€” no accessibility hacks needed.
Disable battery optimization so Android does not kill the proxy service in the background.
All permissions are configured. The proxy is ready to start.
MobileProxy needs notification permission to show the foreground service status while running.
MobileProxy routes traffic through a local VPN. Android requires your approval to create this connection.
This wizard will guide you through the required permissions so the proxy and IP rotation work correctly.
